name: Sonar (Pole)
description:
stand still to use your sonar

catch all the flies

run away from the ghost

I made this game in preparation for a gamejam, so I gave myself a theme to follow and 48 hours to work on it. I choose "waves" as a theme, since it was used in the Global Game Jam of 2017.

In the end, it took me a bit more of the given 48h, because I wanted to polish the game more, but still it was a really good exercise that taught me a lot.
